description: Configuration file for a CFML package
title: Package Manifest

_88person.description: A person who has been involved in creating or maintaining this package

___version.description: The semantic version of the engine that is supported
___version.title: Engine Version

_88dependency.description: Dependencies are specified with a package name/slug to version range, local file path, URL, or Git/SVN endpoint. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors.
_88dependency.title: Dependency

___license.description: List of licenses the package can have
___license.title: Licenses

items.description: A license the package can have
items.title: License

___type.description: The license type. For example, MIT.
___type.title: License Type

___url.description: The URL at which the license resides
___url.title: License URL

___packageDirectory.description: This name will be used for the package sub-directory instead of the slug name
___packageDirectory.title: Package Directory

$eref.description: Dependencies are specified with a package name/slug to version range, local file path, URL, or Git/SVN endpoint. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors.
$eref.title: Dependency

___createPackageDirectory.description: This determines if the container directory will contain a sub-directory according to the package slug name. The default is true
___createPackageDirectory.title: Create Package Directory

$eref.description: Dependencies are specified with a package name/slug to version range, local file path, URL, or Git/SVN endpoint. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors.
$eref.title: Dependency

___version.description: The semantic version of the engine that is supported
___version.title: Engine Version

___defaultPort.description: Deprecated. The HTTP port the server will be started on when you use the start command. Use `port` in `server.json` instead.

___private.description: Designates the package as a private ForgeBox package. Private packages are not publicly accessible, but still offer all the benefits of ForgeBox.
___private.title: Private

___description.description: ForgeBox big description. If not set, it can be taken from a Readme.md, Readme, or Readme.txt
___description.title: Description

___instructions.description: Install instructions. If not set, it can be taken from a instructions.md, instructions, or instructions.txt
___instructions.title: Instructions

___installPaths.description: Tracks install locations so uninstall can work. The key is the package name/slug and the value is the path
___installPaths.title: Install Paths

___location.description: Location of where to download the package. Overrides ForgeBox location
___location.title: Location

___ignore.description: List of file globs to ignore when installing the package similar to .gitignore patterns
___ignore.title: Ignore

___scripts.description: Set of script commands that correspond to the interception points in CommandBox or arbitrary names that can be run with the `run-script` command
___scripts.title: Scripts

___postInstall.description: Run AFTER the package is installed

___onInstall.description: Run WHILE the package is installed

___postUninstall.description: Run AFTER the package is uninstalled

___preUninstall.description: Run BEFORE the package is uninstalled

___preInstall.description: Run BEFORE the package is installed

___postPublish.description: Run AFTER the package is published

___prePublish.description: Run BEFORE the package is published

___postVersion.description: Run AFTER bump the package version, but BEFORE Git repo is tagged

___onRelease.description: Run AFTER bump the package version and AFTER Git repo is tagged

___preVersion.description: Run BEFORE bump the package version

___directory.description: Install directory where this package should be placed once installed. If not defined, it installs were the CommandBox command was executed.
___directory.title: Directory

$eref.description: A person who has been involved in creating or maintaining this package

___projectURL.description: Default project URL if not using CommandBox start server commands
___projectURL.title: Project URL

___defaultEngine.description: The name of the default CFML engine for the `start` command to use.

___excludes.description: A list of labels to exclude when running the tests
___excludes.title: Exclude List

items.description: A label to be excluded from the test run

___labels.description: A list of labels to only include when running the tests
___labels.title: Labels List

items.description: A label a spec must have to be ran

___runner.description: The URI location of the test runner for an app or several with slug names
___runner.title: TestBox Runner

items.description: The runner URIs mapped to slug names

___type.description: The version control system. Popular examples are git, svn, or mercurial
___type.title: Repository Type

___url.description: The URL at which the repository resides
___url.title: Repository URL

___changelog.description: Change log. If not set, it can be taken from a changelog.md, changelog, or changelog.txt
___changelog.title: Change Log
